name: Star Ship Assemble
description:
Star Ship Assemeble is a retro style arcade shoot em' up, where you can create your own star fighter combining several pieces! Defeat the enemies and get the highest score you can!

This game was made for Godot Wild Jam 43: Combine!

____________________________________

Controls

(Controls can be customized in game)

ActionDefault KeysMove LeftLeft Arrow
Move Right
Right Arrow
Move Up
Up Arrow
Move Down
Down Arrow
ShootSpaceUse Secondary Device
EPauseEscape

____________________________________

Credits:

All graphics, programming and sound by James Ridley. Font by Daniel Linssen
